name: GTAtari
description:
GTAtari is a fast-paced, procedurally generated action game. Follow the arrow to the objective, get the quest item and make it back to the safe house alive.

Controls:
Arrow keys - move and jack vehicles
Space - shoot

Features:
- drinking
- customization
- megahard gameplay
- 7 song midi soundtrack (featuring Jay-Z, Weezer, AC/DC)
- hidden 'hard' ending

TIPS:
- you can beat up cops when you're drunk
- trashcans are useful against cops and cop cars, but they can damage you, too.
